Name: Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) for Egyptian patients
Abstract: Egyptian patients who underwent treatment dosages for HCV about 18 months. Discretization should be applied based on expert recommendations; there is an attached file shows how.
RelevantInfo: Provide all relevant information about your data set.
